mapper.select: select * from address where user_no=#{user_no} order by reg_datetime desc;
mapper.insert: insert into address(user_no, name, phone_number, zip_code, address, address_detail, is_default_address, reg_datetime, updated_datetime) values (#{user_no}, #{name}, #{phone_number}, #{zip_code}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{is_default_address}, now(), now());
mapper.update: update address set name=#{name}, phone_number=#{phone_number}, zip_code=#{zip_code}, address=#{address}, address_detail=#{address_detail}, is_default_address=#{is_default_address}, updated_datetime=now() where no = #{no}
